author: timbeiko
content:
Given that we now have 2 EIPs, 3 devnets and the engine API spec for the merge on the execution side, I've opened a PR for a proper spec so we can track things: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/390

It's a bit "weird" in that `merge` isn't the name of the fork, and it won't follow the standard template (e.g. no block number), but I think for clarity it's probably a net positive to add. Will leave the PR open for 24h-ish in case someone has strong objections or major comments.
